ygData.subject: Re: XP bonus?
ygData.msgSnippet: This side of the Plains, there seems to be hardly anyone. That is good and bad. The experience (of the game, not for leveling) has changed in the older worlds.
ygData.messageBody:
This side of the Plains, there seems to be hardly anyone. That is good
and bad. The experience (of the game, not for leveling) has changed in
the older worlds.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Fire on High" <scendera@o...> wrote:
> LOL not on Rodcet, except a few of us old school folks on crap
puters. I go
> to places like Sol A bc there's fewer assholes, hubby and I can hold any
> camp in zone except the king, the exp is still workable and the cash is
> nice. We're also usually the only ones around except maybe a cleric
going
> for Lord Gimp.
> ----- Original Message -----

> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: XP bonus?

>
> > Thanks to those who responded to my question about XP bonuses.

people to go

only
